DIV1.P: The following table includes descriptions of all the processing instructions (PIs) that appear in TextClass templates and that are supported by the CGI (see HTML Templates / Interfaces for more on PIs), as well as links to descriptions of the relevant template files in which they may appear. Note that PIs are not interchangeable with templates; they must be supported in the CGI to be rendered properly.

TR.TD: Provides the HREF URL for the "Boolean" search within book bag link.
Provides the HREF URL for the "proximity" search within book bag link.
Provides the HREF URL for the "simple" search within book bag link.
Provides the HREF URL for the "citation" search form link in the main or footer navigation bar.
Used to insert a full link from a bibliographic header page for adding the current item to the book bag.
Used to insert a button to toggle book bag contents in long or short format.
Used to insert a button to download book bag contents.
Used to insert a button to email book bag contents.
Used to insert a button for removing all book bag contents.
Used to insert the book bag items count in the current page.
Provides the HREF URL for the "view bookbag" link in a page.
Used to insert all current book bag items within table <TR> and <TD> tags.
Provides the HREF URL for the "boolean" search form link in the main or footer navigation bar.
Previously used with search forms to display a table for collections currently being searched
On multiple collection search forms, used to insert the table of available collections with check boxes for selecting or deselecting.
Provides the HREF URL for a collection specific (e.g., browse) navigation link in main nav bar or footer nav bar.
Used to insert the appropriate root path for the collection accessing the template for relative file reference.
Previously used to insert a navigation link from the current citation search form to an extended version of the form.
Previously used to insert a navigation link from the current boolean search form to an extended version of the form.
Previously used to insert a navigation link from the current proximity search form to an extended version of the form.
Previously used to insert a navigation link from the current citation search form to an extended version of the form.
Previously used in search forms to indicate the currently selected collection filter values for gender.
Used to insert an optional select menu for gender restrictions in a search form.
Used to insert a select menu in a multiple collection search form for filtering collections by gender.
Previously used in search forms to indicate the currently selected collection filter values for genre.
Used to insert an optional select menu for genre restrictions in a search form.
Used to insert a select menu in a mulitple collection search form for filtering collections by genre.
Provides the HREF URL for the "multiple collection search" link in a page.
Used to insert the appropriate path and filename for a graphics file.
Used to filter out HTML code for the per-collection results summary from the results page when only one collection has been searched.
That portion of the per-collection results summary code that inserts links for viewing results detail for each collection.
Used to insert bibliographic information on a particular book within table <TR> and <TD> tags.
Used to insert a linked table of contents from a book header display to the text display.
Used to text label atop a linked label of contents from a book header display.
Used to insert a hyperlink to a named anchor on the book header display that allows a user to quickly link to a linked table of contents from the top of a header display.
Provides the HREF URL for the "help" link in the main or footer navigation bar.

Used to insert a hidden INPUT element into a form indicating a user has contributed items to a bookbag. If a book bag is present, this PI renders as <INPUT TYPE="hidden" name="bookbag" value="1">, otherwise no element is created.
Used to insert one or more hidden INPUT elements into a word index form to retain values checked in the index in previous pages.
Used to insert a hidden INPUT element into a form indicating whether the user is within a specific group search environment. The element value is the specific group name.
Used to insert a hidden INPUT element into a form within a pageviewer or text-idx rendering of a text indicating the unique id number of that text.
Used to insert a hidden INPUT element into a word index form indicating which character type the index is comprised of. Available values are "alpha," "num," and "misc."
Used to insert a hidden INPUT element into a search form storing the currently selected collection[s].
Used to insert a hidden INPUT element in a word index form to indicate the search region for the index terms.
Used to insert hidden INPUT elements in a word index form to indicate the top and bottom terms in the current slice of the word index.
Used to insert hidden INPUT form elements indicating the current session id.

Used to insert a hidden INPUT element into a form indicating that the current search environment is a cross-collection one. If the current environment is a cross-collection one, this PI renders as <INPUT TYPE="hidden" name="xc" value="1">, otherwise no element is created.
Used to insert or exclude HTML code for a secondary navigation bar for within book bag search options.
Used to insert or exclude HTML code for optional search links on book bag contents and/or email forms.
Used to include or exclude navigation link code for features that are available only for certain collections.
Used to insert or exclude HTML code for a link to multiple collection interface.
Used to include or exclude a linked table of contents to a bibliographic header display.
Used to include an HTML link back to most current results listing from a text display or header display.
Used to include or exclude HTML code for a page size menu in pageviewer.
Used in multiple search forms to provide Javascript code for implementing the collection selecting functionality.
Used to supply a relevant source path to the SRC attribute of the <SCRIPT> element. The order of priority for path is from collection specific directory to class directory.
Previously used in search forms to indicate the currently selected collection filter values for language.
Used to insert a select menu in a multiple collection search form for filtering collections by language.
Provides the SRC URL for the page content frame in the pageviewer frameset.
Provides the SRC URL for the navigation frame in the pageviewer frameset.
Provides the SRC URL for the page navigation frame in the pageviewer frameset.
Used to insert HREF URL code for the "next page" button in pageviewer.
Previously used in search forms to indicate the number of collections currently being searched.
Previously used in search forms to indicate the number of texts currently being searched.
Used to insert the ASCII text or image reference in the main content frame of pageviewer.
Used to insert the select menu for jumping to a page in the current book in pageviewer.
Previously used in search forms to indicate the currently selected collection filter values for period.
Used to insert an optional select menu for period restrictions in a search form.
Used to insert a select menu in a multiple collection search form for filtering collections by period.
Used to insert a linked list of possible titles to select for viewing in pageviewer or text display.
Used to insert HREF URL code for the "previous page" button in pageviewer.
Provides the HREF URL for the "proximity" search form link in the main or footer navigation bar.
Inserts an optional pair of form INPUT boxes for restricting searches by a range of publication dates.
Used to insert an INPUT box into a search form for the first query term.
Used to insert an INPUT box into a search form for the second query term.
Used to insert an INPUT box into a search form for the third query term.
Used to insert a select menu into a search form for selecting a region to restrict search terms to.
Inserts detailed results listings within table <TR> and <TD> tags
Used to insert summary info for results details per collection.
Used to insert an HTML link back to results listings from the pageviewer.
Provides the HREF URL for the "Authorized user login" link from any page.
Used to insert the content of a linked note in a target window.
Used to insert a relevant script name into a collection-specific URL path.
Provides the HREF URL for the "history" page link in the main or footer navigation bar.
Used to insert the search history items within table <TR> and <TD> tags.
Used to insert the current search string as entered atop the results list display.
Used to insert an optional string indicating that a current search form is restricted to a single item.
Used to insert HTML links into a header display for searches restricted to the current item.
Used to insert the content of encoded items into a text display as HTML.
Provides the HREF URL for the "simple" search form link in the main or footer navigation bar.
Used to include or exclude HTML code in a single collection search form for adding restrictions by gender.
Used to include or exclude HTML code in a single collection search form for adding restrictions by genre.
Used to include or exclude HTML code in a single collection search form for adding restrictions by period.
Used to include or exclude HTML code in a single collection search form for restricting a search to a range of publication dates.
Used to insert a select menu for changing the size of a page image in pageviewer.
Used to insert the links for navigating between the current page of search results and other pages of results.
Used to insert the collection title logo as an HTML graphic or text string within <A> tags linking to the collection home page.
Used to provide the content of the <TITLE> element.
Used to insert hidden INPUT tags into a pageviewer navigation form indicating currently viewed page sequence number and/or current query term[s].
Used to insert a form SELECT menu into the pageviewer navigation frame for selecting "view page as" options.
Provides the HREF URL for a link to view the entire text from the view mediating warning page.
Used to insert the list of terms and occurrence numbers (within table <TR> and <TD> tags) for each slice of a word index.
Used to insert HTML code for the "scroll-down" button in the word index.
Used to insert alphabetical and/or numeric indexes into a word index as HTML links.
Used to insert RADIO buttons into word index forms for selecting realms (i.e., text regions) to retrieve word indexes from.
Provides the HREF URL for the "word index" start form link in the main or footer navigation bar.
Used to insert HTML code for the "scroll-up" button in the word index.
Used to insert or exclude an HTML link to a word index search form.
Used to insert in a results display the total number of records retrieved for searches against multiple collections.
Used to insert or exclude multiple collection information in search forms.
